interface calc {
  (a: number, b: number): number;
}

const add: calc = (x, y) => x + y;
const minus: calc = (x, y) => x - y;
const multi: calc = (x, y) => x * y;
const divide: calc = (x, y) => x / y;

// callback ν•¨μ μμ 
function printLog(callback: calc, a: number, b: number) {
  console.log(callback(a, b));
}
printLog(add, 3, 5);
